Bryan Washington (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1993) bụ onye edemede America
O bipụtara nchịkọta akụkọ mkpirikpi mbụ ya, nke a kpọrọ Lot, na 2019 na akwụkwọ akụkọ, Memorial, na 2020.

A mụrụ Washington n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1993 na Kentucky wee kwaga Katy, Texas mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ. Ọ maara na ọ bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya mgbe ọ dị obere mana ọ pụtaghị n'ụzọ doro anya, na-atụ egwu nke ịkpa ókè
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na James E
Taylor High School na 2011. Washington gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Houston wee nweta nzere BA na Bekee, wee gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadim New Orleans ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nwere MFA.

Lot, usoro akụkọ mkpirikpi jikọtara ọnụ na Houston, nke Riverhead bipụtara n'afọ 2019. Akwụkwọ ahụ na-elekwasị anya na Nicolás, nwa okorobịa nke agbụrụ ndị Africa America na Latino America nke na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ezinụlọ ya mgbe ọ na-anabata mmekọahụ ya. Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ ihe mmeri nke 2019 Ernest J
Gaines Award for Literary Excellence, 2020 Dylan Thomas Prize, na 2020 Lambda Literary Award for Gay Fiction.

E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke Washington nke a kpọrọ Memorial, na Ọktoba 27, 2020. Tupu mbipụta ya, A24 zụrụ ikike iji gbanwee akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ maka telivishọn, ebe Washington na-agbanwe akwụkwọ akụkọ ya.
Washington na-ekwu okwu n'asụsụ Bekee na Mahadum Rice, ebe na Julaị 2020 e mere ya George Guion Williams Writer in Residence and Scholar in Residence for Racial Justice.
